title: WILLING AND ABLE: Seduced Into Contract
description: Eve Rogers is a Tennessee beauty who sells dreams of the Smokey Mountains as a realtor.A man wanted to buy a vacation cabin for his bride to be as a surprise, and he brought a friend along who kept surprising Eve.Within hours Eve is negotiating the deal of her life, and the terms are astounding, as the man pushes for a quick closing.They find out who is ready, willing, and able.
author: Alvin Slater
